CVE-2005-0575.summary: Buffer overflow in Stormy Studios Knet 1.04c and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a long HTTP GET request.

CVE-2005-1125.summary: Race condition in libsafe 2.0.16 and earlier, when running in multi-threaded applications, allows attackers to bypass libsafe protection and exploit other vulnerabilities before the _libsafe_die function call is completed.
